about_the_game: R 18+ Adult patch adds optional sex scenes as a part of the culmination of romanceable character storylines.

content_descriptors.notes: The game is set in the Caribbean during the Golden Age of Piracy. Thus, criminal acts like piracy, smuggling and theft feature heavily in the plot. Given that a lot of the game is set in pirate taverns and ports, topics like prostitution are also occasionally mentioned. The game also heavily features adult lesbian romantic relationships between women.  This DLC contains explicit, uncensored sex scenes that are yuri/lesbian.

detailed_description: R 18+ Adult patch adds optional sex scenes as a part of the culmination of romanceable character storylines.
name: You Are My Treasure Adults Only 18+ Patch
short_description: R 18+ Adult patch adds optional sex scenes as a part of the culmination of romanceable character storylines.
